website_summaries.verdict: Heavy-duty satin-finish plastic adds a touch of style to your shower or tub area. Mount with included silicone glue or screws.
pros: Three 15-ounce dispensers release a set amount at the push of a button
Mirror for shaving, soap tray, small shelf for necessities, and small hooks to hang washcloth or scrubber
cons: The plastic containers crack easily if dropped
Some owners complain that the dispenser can't handle thick conditioner

customer_reviews.title: One thing I would like to see is a little more vertical space for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had the organizer for 6 months now and it works very well. I did have a concern about the mirror fogging when I first got it but by applying a thin film of shampoo or body wash to it the fog is repelled. One thing I would like to see is a little more vertical space for hanging razors because you have to force it in a bit with the newer handles that are thicker than a traditional disposable.
customer_reviews.author: Colin M.

customer_reviews.title: Plastic bottles for products did not hold up for even a week!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item too far in advance of making some upgrades in our bathroom, and finally installed it about a week ago. It worked fine for 6 days, but today one of the plastic bottles shattered from the normal pressure of pushing the dispenser button. (We are not at all overly rough with household items, and this damage was quite a surprise.) The window of return timing has passed, and I'm hoping the seller covers this product failure, at least to get replacement bottles now and in the future, if needed. Seller, Better Living Products, Please Advise!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley N.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product except for the adhesive that comes with it.
customer_reviews.text: So before I bought this I read a lot of the reviews and a lot of them talked about bad adhesion with the stuff that came with it. So I ordered Gorilla construction adhesive. I cleaned the wall really well and let it dry. I used the construction adhesive and followed those directions. I held it in place for 30 min. Pain in the ass, but I haven’t had any issues since. Just make sure to follow the directions about getting the bottles to work correctly. Other than that (having to buy different adhesive) it’s amazing! It has decreased the clutter in my shower and I can have everything on or in it. Definitely a good investment for me.
customer_reviews.author: MKYork

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pansies
customer_reviews.text: If I'm being honest, using body wash gel makes me feel like a candy-ass. I'm more of a bar soap guy. But, bar soap leaves a lot more soap scum, which makes work for my wife. Happy wife, happy life. So, it was either use shower gel or help clean the shower. Works well. Doesn't leak. Looks decent. I am liking shaving in the shower, though the mirror is NOT fog free.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in product and the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: Received it, put it up and 2 out of the 3 dispensers didn’t work. Amazon sent me a replacement. This time 3 out of 3 didn’t work. Amazon suggested that I contact manufacturing company. “This is very unusual and hadn’t had any reports of this happening.” Did what they suggested and it still doesn’t work. Contacted again and waiting to hear back....I’m doubtful I will. Very disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Thaut

customer_reviews.title: Work as expected.  Tip on initial loading ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount the unit to the shower wall with the included material. One challenge I had was I couldn't get the conditioner to pump through. Likely because the liquid was so thick. Nothing comes out no matter how much I pump. Here's a tip that will quickly resolve the issue: 1. Push down on the pump button and hold it. 2. Use your other hand to block the nozzle so air cannot be sucked in when you release the pump button. 3. Release pump button while your other finger firmly holds the nozzle to prevent air leak. 4. Release nozzle and repeat step 1~3. It will start to flow after 3 or 4 times.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Good Dispenser, Sub Par Adhesion
customer_reviews.text: Most importantly, my wife likes the design and functionality of this shower dispenser unit. It replaced one that was at least 11 years old. The double sided foam tape and silicone caulk supplied is not enough, in my opinion (and experience). I purchased a roll of stronger tape, used four strips of it on the back of the unit, thoroughly cleaned the shower wall, ending with alcohol rubbed over the entire area, and then pressed the unit into place and waited one day before loading the individual dispenser units with shampoo, rinse, etc. It has held perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Gantenbein

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Function,  but cheap materials and buttons fall off when refilling
customer_reviews.text: The Good: This dispenser meets all of the functions needed. I have 3 razors on the hooks along with a wash puff. I have shaving cream and face wash on the top shelf, soap in the tray and then shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in the Dispenser. The Bad: When you lift the dispenser to refill the bottles, all of the buttons fall of the dispensers, it is a bit of a balancing act to open without them all falling off. While the dispenser is down, they stay in place. The bottles feel a lot cheaper than my last dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Had mine since 7/13/2012
customer_reviews.text: So, I've had mine since 7/13/2012 and it has worked flawlessly since then. It has stuck to the wall with the factory adhesive and it shows no signs of coming off the tile in the shower. I've put several shampoo bottles on the top shelf (even bigger, heavier bottles) as well as having the dispensers full and it is rock solid. This has been one of the best purchases I've made, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Al Nitz

customer_reviews.title: Love the concept, but I wish the quality was better.
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our RV and our Vacation Rental Home we rent out. It is great for reducing space and clutter in the showers. It not only houses the shampoo, conditioner, and body wash, I hang a loofa sponge, bath scrubber, and razor. I also use the top shelf for my face soap and any other items I may need. The things I don't like is that it is cheaply made. You would think that they could make it a little more sturdy. Also, when cleaning the mirror, it comes off super easy and you have to put it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Julie West

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product; met all our needs!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Solved the specific needs for our shower. Use the first two dispensers for shampoo and conditioner and the third for baby shampoo. Hung the unit according to husband’s height so he can use mirror while shaving; use the hooks for razors (have separate suction hooks for loofas and washcloths) and top shelf for face soaps and specialty products like deep conditioner. Love how it consolidated and streamlined the products we use in our shower!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi by GHL

customer_reviews.title: Great value and no issues!!
customer_reviews.text: Was concerned by all the reviews of people saying it fell off the wall, so for a change, I followed the directions. Easy Peasy! I used ALL OF THE GLUE and put the stickers in place. I did not clean the tile or the plastic shower wall (we ordered 2 for 2 bathrooms). I put them up at noon on Saturday, both showres were used Sunday and Monday. Monday evening I filled the bottles. Have to be patient with priming the pumps, but that is to be expected. So versatile - we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great for daily use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I use it daily. My fiance first told me it was a stupid purchase, but now he uses it more than I do! It is very sturdy and user friendly. I recommend for all showers, adult and kids alike. It also is great for helping monitor how much soap you use. Saves you $$!
customer_reviews.author: GMSqueaky

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Now my GF has more crap in the shower.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for shows use. Very strong. Got it for my girlfriend to clean her side of the shower. Now we have that and all her bottles! Just gave her a greater selection of soaps in the shower. Silicone adhesive is amazing and she has tons of stuff hanging as well as all bottles full and bottles on the shelf. Make sure to clean the tile really good before adhesion.
customer_reviews.author: Jon R

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open. Doesn't feel sturdy. Buttons feel cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to open, bottles fall out and shatter when they fall on shower floor. You can order replacements from better living and they are cheap but they take several days to get to the states from Canada and shipping costs more than the replacement parts. Buttons feel cheap and don't pump a lot. Wish I had spent more money for something a little sturdier. I do like the mirror and the hooks. Lots of correct features, just a cheap version of something that could be really great.
customer_reviews.author: fbtenor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, no rust, no bs
customer_reviews.text: I dont have to receive this to rate it a 5 star product. I own one and decided after 5 years to add another to the other bathroom. The pumps are lifetime warranty replaceable and pretty much thats all you need to replace. Been 5 years and still use original ones so I already got my moneys with no issues. This mirror simply splash soap and it will not fog up at all. The adhesive they provide you with will hold up pretty good and so far no mold behind it. Plastic must be specifically for high heat or steam because it does not warp or fade. HomeDepot stopped selling this locally so Amazon is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: The latch to release the front in order to fill the containers did not work. Flimsy piece of plastic, very fragile, broke with the lightest pressure to open...
customer_reviews.author: RSB

customer_reviews.title: I really like this. My parents have had one up for ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. My parents have had one up for 15 years In their shower. I have white subway tile in an apartment so I didn't want anything permanent. However after 1 month the unit fell but all of the silicone was still in the wall (none on the unit). I used goo-gone, alcohol and a plastic scraper from Ace to remove the silicone from the wall (it took forever to scrape). I got some silicone sealant and waterproof 3M strips from the hardware store and I'm going to try again after I a sand the back of the unit a little.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't think I would like it at first
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think I would like it at first, but it is nice to have! Shampoo, Conditioner, and baby shampoo is what we use in them. The razor holder slots don't fit our razor, but we hang the loofa and face scrubby pad from them. Razor sits nicely on top. Mirror is great for making sure I got all my eye make up removed instead of smeared all over my face.
customer_reviews.author: JBLACK

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace 2 that were quite old and the bottles were beginning to have problems. Cheaper to buy new ones and this has more functionality than a dispenser alone. The mirror fogs up, but it is in a shower. Its nice having more places to put shower sponges, razors and other products on. Looks good and works like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It is convenient to have soap dispensers and organizers and mirror as one unit! I wish the way to refill the containers would have been a different design. It is a hassle to take things off to lift up the front cover to refill the bottles! It's a little tricky to click the front cover to close it. I was afraid it would break while closing it since it's plastic. The pumps dispense well. The mirror is not fog free.
customer_reviews.author: Simplified

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: These are FANTASTIC! I got SO tired of metal shower organizers that claim to be "rust-proof" or "rust resistant" and ALWAYS ended up rusty and disgusting! This solves that problem and tidies up the shower stall as well. Ordered two of them - "his & hers" and my husband has ZERO complaints. Makes my little OCD heart happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: great until it broke itself
customer_reviews.text: I opened the lid to refill the conditioner and one of the dispensers jumped out, landed on the floor of the shower and broke. Very sad because I really liked this product. I had the product about 2 and a half months. Update: Still have not heard back from the company or its customer service even after I reached out to them. Downgrading from two stars to one star. :(
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great space saving accessory!
customer_reviews.text: This has been hanging in our shower for about a year and a half now, and it's working great. It's in a shower stall, the wall is plastic, not tile. We followed the instructions for mounting and haven't had any issues. Fairly easy to refill, decent storage space as well. Thicker liquids (conditioners) tend to empty from the middle, so the indicator can't really be relied on to prompt a refill. I gave 4 stars just because you do have to take everything off to refill any of the dispensers.
customer_reviews.author: Furball

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for about a year. Perfect for a shower without soap or shampoo storage area. Mounted securely to tile wall and has plenty of shelf space. Dispensers have worked reliably without leaking. I like to shave in the shower so the little mirror is handy and there is room below the mirror to hang razors.
customer_reviews.author: Mira G. Dessy

customer_reviews.title: Expensive mistake
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a week until the adhesive mount failed, broke my hot water knob on the shower and spilled out all of the shampoo, conditioner, and body wash I filled it with. This thing ended up costing me way more than the original price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: it's my third buy. love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: It actually saves you a lot of money and prevents you from over using shampoo/conditioner. I have it in each bathroom, fit my scrubbing sponge and my razor. Installation is super easy and no screws are required. The first one I bought was two years ago, and it is still working, no problems at all!
customer_reviews.author: T.K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice pumps
customer_reviews.text: follow the instructions and you'll love it too! it might seem a bit flimsy before it is all put up, but any extra weight just means more strain on the glue and it looks and feels great as soon as I had it installed. I'll warn you that you should measure twice here, because once you press this on with the liquid cement, it is not coming off easily. For this reason, I wouldn't recommend it for rentals. This has not only organized my shower, but it has also led to much less use of the liquids it stores. Now we get just enough rather than way too much.
customer_reviews.author: D. Michelson

customer_reviews.title: Get extra adhesive.. Lots
customer_reviews.text: Used tape that came with it and bought/used extra. Thing fell day three and put a hole my fiberglass tub.
customer_reviews.author: JBT3

customer_reviews.title: Everything in one simple place
customer_reviews.text: I love the functionality of this in my shower. Compact and holds everything I need and has a mirror for shaving which I needed
customer_reviews.author: Scott Whitney

customer_reviews.title: After four years of use, still works great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in 2008, and didn't really expect it to still be working flawlessly four years later, but it is. The adhesive is even still stuck to the tile. The only issue we had was operator error - we dropped one of the bottles, full, on the floor, RIGHT on the valve (after filling), and it cracked one of the plastic bottles. This was easily fixed with some silicone after cleaning the bottle out thoroughly. I'd definitely buy it again, and plan to buy one for my other bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: J. Bass

customer_reviews.title: Check your bottles first before mounting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace one I had had for many years. I really like it but one of the bottles won't dispense. I've tried fiddling with it but it just won't work. I'd like to find out if you can get replacement bottles. I can't send it back since I've akready mounted it in my shower. Just tried to order replacement bottle. It's 5.30. Okay, but it's $13.00 for shipping! Are you kidding me! Very ticked!

customer_reviews.text: Followed the directions, waited 24 hours.... after putting filling bottles and putting it up around 7pm at 3am I heard a loud noise. It fell. Maybe super glue will keep it up there???
customer_reviews.author: Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this product! We have been using it in our shower for over a year now with no problems at all. A little shelf at the top to hold your razors or extras in the shower. Easy cleaning and refill which I need with such a busy household! Would definitely recommend. Just make sure you follow the directions for installation which are simple and this item will stick without trouble!

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!

customer_reviews.title: Great soap dispenser!

customer_reviews.title: Free of clutter
customer_reviews.text: Great way to keep your tub free of Clutter Durable material easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Algenis Vicente

customer_reviews.title: No more mess
customer_reviews.text: Sticks to wall of RV great. This has cleaned up the clutter and made showering so much easier

customer_reviews.author: Michele Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Fell Down After Only Two Months!
customer_reviews.text: Beware! I bought this based on all the positive reviews. We installed it EXACTLY as instructed, using the double-sided tape as well as the entire bottle of silicone. After only two months, we heard a loud crash in the bathroom, and found it, along with all the bottles, on our shower floor. It's bad enough that it didn't stay up, but it was quite a mess to clean up, and now we have to try to get the silicone "glue" off of the tile. What a disaster!
customer_reviews.author: S. McMichael

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the product, but like other's have stated, a thick conditioner won't go through. You have to water it down to get it to go through. Other than that, I love it! I like that I can put my razor and face wash on the little shelf and have hooks for our shower poofs. Another reviewer suggested using water resistant "Command strips" to attatch it and still be able to remove down the line if ever the need. I did just that and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: supermeof4

customer_reviews.title: Product received with a used soap container. It was sold as new.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in the US as a gift for a friend in Europe. Now I am in Europe and my friend opened the gift. It has absolutely nothing to attach it to the wall - missing hardware and adhesive (as I received for the one I bought for my home). One of the soap containers was not new. It was definitely used and cracked into several pieces. Very disappointed as I purchased this in July and never opened it before giving it to my friend.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie G.

customer_reviews.title: Util-Mate Three Chamber - Satin Finish
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first Ulti-Mate about 9 years ago and it is still in great shape. I did drop one of the bottles and cracked the spout at the bottom...but it still works! I have the satin silver finish and there has been no color fade or wear. I could buy this new unit for less than I could replace the bottles in my old unit. How ever parts are available from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have bought this sooner
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I was so sick of having all of my bottles on the floor and the kids wasting them. This was so easy to install and use. The mirror is an awesome feature, overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great - mirror is nice
customer_reviews.text: I've used this dispenser for a week and so far so good. I didn't use the silicon glue that comes with it because I'm in a rental unit and need to be able to remove it when I leave. Instead, I used the 3M adhesive pads that came with it PLUS a 4 strip package of the Command Large Water-Resistant Refill Strips (the add-on that came with it).The mirror is good, it shows more detail than the bathroom mirror. The amount of liquid dispensed each time is small; it takes my wife, with hair down to mid-back, about 5 pumps to get enough shampoo out. The best part is that the bathtub is now clutter free.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Remove clutter from the tub/shower
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. Was super easy the hang. I had no problems getting it to dispense after following directions. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Very Functional..
customer_reviews.text: This unit was bought to replace a prior unit that had 4 dispensers & the plastic closer had broken where it would no longer stay closed(unit was over 10 years old). I only needed 3 dispensers & that is reason for downsize. Mirror is basically not used but top shelf & razor brackets always full. I have had very little trouble with the dispensers leaking, but from time to time they have & after taking apart & giving a good cleaning they are almost like new..
customer_reviews.author: Dstealth

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install if you follow the directions. Gets all those messy bottles out of the shower and eliminates the need for an over the shower head holder or one of those floor to ceiling racks that deteriorate and fall apart. We got two for our shower (his and hers) and one for the kids. It helps the kids to use the right amount of product also!

Super cute and perfect for a small shower.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Shower Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This gets all the bottles off the floor of my shower and helps keep my shower cleaner! Only had it for a little over a month, but love it!
customer_reviews.author: CDR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dispenser for what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: The three pumps are great for shampoo, conditioner and shower gel. The hooks are great for your poofy thingy a razor, etc. And the top shelf is great for all the miscellaneous face washes, microdermabrasion, etc. Mirror fogs up after just a few minutes of the shower running but if you put some conditioner over it, it clears up. Easy to fill containers except you do have to take everything off to open the top to get to the bottles. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Falls

customer_reviews.title: Frees up floor space.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. I like the fact that it frees up shower floor space and hold enough to products too. I was worried at first that it would not stay put on the wall and it did feel very “plasticy” but so far so good.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the shower area tidy

I gave it four stars for how many pushes it took to prime each bottle, over 20 for each of them & for how many pumps for body wash...at least eight for a decent lather. We'll see how long it lasts. But for under $20, it's not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonwoman73

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We had one for over 10 years and the bottles started to leak so we order a new one love it just like the first one
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Ritschard

customer_reviews.title: Love it!

I have the other one that has 4 dispensers and the hook and it works much better. This one looks a little better but it doesn't function well at all.
customer_reviews.author: C Camp

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Installation was easy
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Installation was easy, with both the included adhesive strips and silicone. This eliminated; 1) soap dish 2) 3 large bottles (shampoo, conditioner and body wash) 3) a wall hook holding a body sponge and nail brush 4) razors sitting on the windowsill 5) a separate shaving mirror suction cupped to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Great Dispenser!

Now we have shampoo, conditioner, body wash, soap, razors, and toothpaste (on top) in one organized place. Just so much better.
customer_reviews.author: H. Caronna

customer_reviews.title: Love it, panel a bit difficult to close.
customer_reviews.text: Once installed, after filling the 3 dispensers, it’s difficult to get the front panel to close completely. This is my 2nd unit, the first was almond and I had for almost 15 yrs! Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Great product and quick delivery!

customer_reviews.text: We used the silicon to adhere it to the wall since we didn't want to drill into our tile and risk cracking it. I would recommended this dispenser to anyone wanting to declutter their shower or bathroom area!!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my 5th Wheel
customer_reviews.text: Stays on strong and easy to fill. Great product for the price.
